detectors.description:
Low level call in Address.sendValue(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERCToken__5.sol#262-268):
	- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERCToken__5.sol#266)

ERCToken.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERCToken__5.sol#525-529) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _mint(msg.sender,5000000 * (10 ** uint256(decimals()))) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERCToken__5.sol#528)
